item.description:
Jonathan Miller's BBC series "A Brief History of Disbelief" is currently showing on PBS stations nationwide. We showed the first episode at our July monthly meeting, and the second at last month's Humanist Conversations meeting. This month, we'll view and discuss the third and final installment.

We will meet in the library at USNH. Refreshments will be served.

This meeting was previously announced as being on September 8th, but has been moved as there will be a memorial service at USNH on the 8th.
item.name: Humanist Conversations: A Brief History of Disbelief, Part 3
